Uses of Package
org.greatage.ioc.resource

Packages that use org.greatage.ioc.resource
org.greatage.domain.hibernate   
org.greatage.ioc.resource This package represents all classes for working with application resources such as files or message bundles. 
org.greatage.security.drools   
 

Classes in org.greatage.ioc.resource used by org.greatage.domain.hibernate
ResourceLocator
          This interface represents utility producing resources by path.
 

Classes in org.greatage.ioc.resource used by org.greatage.ioc.resource
AbstractMessages
          This class represents abstract implementation of Messages returns placeholder if doesn't contain localized string key and uses String.format(java.util.Locale, String, Object...) for formatting.
AbstractMessagesSource
          This class represents abstract implementation of messages source that delegates messages creation by class to creation by class name.
AbstractResource
          This class represents abstract Resource implementation that implements all base logic.
AbstractResourceLocator
          This class represents abstract ResourceLocator implementation that uses configured root resource for retrieving other resources.
ClasspathResource
          This class represents Resource implementation that is based on application classpath.
Messages
          This class represents localized strings mapped by keys for particular locale.
MessagesSource
          This interface represents utility producing messages by class or name.
Resource
          This interface represents application hierarchical localized resource that can be represented as input stream.
ResourceLocator
          This interface represents utility producing resources by path.
 

Classes in org.greatage.ioc.resource used by org.greatage.security.drools
ResourceLocator
          This interface represents utility producing resources by path.
